name: Chainsaw Man fangame
description:
Controls :

WASD / ZQSD / Arrow keys  :   Movement
Escape  :   Back to main menu

(  Play practice mode to know the other controls and how the game works  )

Has 3 waves and then a boss

Music by Paul Owen
SFX from Pixabay

I've been a big fan of the manga since early 2022 and so this is my love letter to the Chainsawman series

Like what you see ? :) Follow me on Twitter
